item.title: How-to for Flow as a Service
item.description: This page will guide you through the set of steps needed to make your flogo application run as ‘Flow as a Service’. AWS Lambda function Follow these steps to create an AWS Lambda function example Requirements Install flogo cli details here Install docker here make command available Create the application Create a flogo.json file with the following content { "name": "lambda", "type": "flogo:app", "version": "0.0.1", "description": "My flogo application description", "triggers": [ { "id": "my_lambda_trigger", "ref": "github.
